page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: {CHRISTIANITY}IS THE MOST COMMON RELIGION IN THIS AREA,MOST FAMILIES ARE MEMBERS OF THE CHURCH OF ENGLAND.WITHIN OUR GEOGRAPHIC REGION THERE IS ONE CHURCH THE ELIM PENTICOSTAL CHURCH.ONE QUARTER OF THE FAMILIES IN OUR DISTRICT ARE MEMBERS OF THE MUSLIM FAITH.MANY OF THE CHILDREN OF {HOLYOAKES FIELD FIRST {SCHOOL}GO TO THE MOSQUE AT THE END OF THE NORMAL SCHOOL DAY.AT THE MOSQUE THE CHILDREN ARE TAUGHT TO READ THE{ {KORAN,}THEY ALSO LEARN A GREAT DEAL OF THIS HOLY BOOK BY HEART.MOST OF THE FATHERS ATTEND THE MOSQUE REGULARLY. OTHER CHRISTIAN CHURCHES THAT LOCAL PEOPLE ATTEND,INCLUDE THE CATHOLIC CHURCH,A BAPTIST CHURCH,A METHODIST CHURCH,AND OTHERS.
